dict.string: FitLife needs access to your health data to provide personalized fitness recommendations and track your progress accurately.
FitLife will save your workout data and nutrition information to Apple Health for comprehensive health tracking.
FitLife uses your location to track outdoor workouts like running, cycling, and hiking with GPS accuracy.
FitLife uses your location to automatically detect workouts and provide location-based fitness insights.
FitLife uses motion sensors to automatically detect workouts and count steps for accurate activity tracking.
FitLife uses the camera to analyze your meals and provide accurate nutrition information.
FitLife can analyze photos from your library to log meals and track nutrition.
